name: Tiny Dictator
description:
Tiny Dictator is a side-scrolling arcade game in which you play as a teensy weensy wanna-be dictator who needs help destroying evidence, flushing out pesky wiretappers, undermining democracy, and most importantly... searching for his best pal, Putey! All in a day's work, right?

Tiny Dictator is a work of political parody. It is a silly game intended for entertainment, and is not officially endorsed by any party, politician, NPO or charity.
